generic.betaWarning: This feature is currently in beta. Bugs and breaking changes may occur. Please report any issues on: https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis/issues

notificationInput.help: If you want to inform the registered students and the assigned tutor about changes in this tutorial group, you can enter a notification text here. A notification containing the text will be sent.

locationInput.placeholderOffline: How can the students find the room?

timeInput.invalidTimeRange: Time range must be a valid time range!

dateInput.label: Date
dateInput.requiredDateError: You need to select a date for the tutorial group session!
dateInput.parseError: Date must be in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'

timeInput.invalidTimeRange: Time range must be a valid time range!

locationInput.maxLengthValidationError: Location / Link is limited to {{ max }} characters!
locationInput.requiredValidationError: You need to enter a location / link!

timeZoneInput.label: Timezone
timeZoneInput.beta: The time zone is currently only used in conjunction with the tutorial group feature. It currently has no influence on other areas of Artemis
timeZoneInput.changeWarning: You have changed the timezone. All individually created sessions and tutorial free days will be deleted. Only schedules sessions will be recreated in the new time zone. Are you absolutely sure you want to do this?
timeZoneInput.explanation: The time zone in which the tutorial groups occur. This will be used to interpret the start and end times of the tutorial groups. You can search for a time zone by typing into the field.
timeZoneInput.requiredValidationError: You need to select a time zone!

periodInput.label: Tutorial Group Period
periodInput.explanation: The period in which the tutorial groups occur in the semester. This will the default schedule of every tutorial group. It can be overridden by individual schedules. For example, if you enter '01-01-2020 - 01-06-2020' here, all tutorial groups will have a default schedule from '01-01-2020 - 01-06-2020' by default. You can change this later for individual tutorial groups.
periodInput.requiredValidationError: You need to select a period!
periodInput.parseError: Period must be in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD - YYYY-MM-DD'
periodInput.invalidRangeError: Period must be a valid date range

tutorialGroupsManagement.intro: Welcome to the tutorial group management page! A beta feature of Artemis that allows you to manage online and offline weekly tutorial groups
tutorialGroupsManagement.title: Tutorial Groups Management

deleteDialog.question: Are you sure to delete the Tutorial Group with title {{ title }}?
deleteDialog.confirm: Please enter the title of the tutorial group to confirm.

checklist.title: Tutorial Group Checklist
checklist.explanation: Before you can start using the tutorial groups feature, you must perform some configuration steps
checklist.timeZone: The course has a time zone configured
checklist.timeZoneExplanation: The course needs a time zone configured so that the tutorial groups can be scheduled correctly according to that time zone.
checklist.configurationExplanation: The course needs a course wide configuration for the tutorial groups. This configuration contains default settings for all tutorial groups.
checklist.configuration: The course has a tutorial group configuration

tutorialFreePeriodsManagement.explanation: Define course wide days on which no tutorial groups should take place. This can be used to define holidays or other days on which no tutorial groups should take place.
tutorialFreePeriodsManagement.title: Tutorial Free Days Management
tutorialFreePeriodsManagement.timeZoneExplanation: Every day displayed in the time zone {{ timeZone }}

deleteDialog.question: Are you sure that you want to delete the tutorial group free day: {{ title }}?

tutorialGroupSessionManagement.title: Tutorial Group Session Management
tutorialGroupSessionManagement.timeZoneExplanation: Every session displayed in the time zone {{ timeZone }}
tutorialGroupSessionManagement.differsFromSchedule: This session has a different date or location than the schedule!

deleteDialog.question: Are you sure that you want to delete the tutorial group session: {{ title }}?

cancelSession.title: Cancel Session
cancelSession.question: Do you really want to cancel the session {{label}}?
cancelSession.explanation: Give a reason for cancelling the session:
cancelSession.maxLengthValidationError: Reason can be max {{ max }} characters long!

activateSession.title: Activate Cancelled Session
activateSession.question: Do you really want to activate the cancelled session {{label}}?

registeredStudents.title: Registered Students
registeredStudents.header: Registered Students for Tutorial Group {{ title }}
registeredStudents.capacityWarning: The capacity of this tutorial group of {{ capacity }} has been reached. Are you sure you want to register more students?

createTutorialGroupsConfiguration.title: Create global Tutorial Groups Configuration
createTutorialGroupsConfiguration.explanation: Before you can start creating tutorial groups, you must specify some properties that concern all tutorial groups. This can also be changed later.
